channel.title: CVE Feed for ETSI -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ETSI -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-24400|2024-09-12T20:30:58.123Z -- etsi -- tetra%20standard
item.description: A flaw in the TETRA authentication procecure allows a MITM adversary that can predict the MS challenge RAND2 to set session key DCK to zero.

item.title: CVE-2022-24402|2024-09-12T20:31:31.278Z -- etsi -- tetra%20standard
item.description: The TETRA TEA1 keystream generator implements a key register initialization function that compresses the 80-bit key to only 32 bits for usage during the keystream generation phase, which is insufficient to safeguard against exhaustive search attacks.
